parts.text: {"word":"composition","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"構成、組織、構造","english_definition":"the way in which something is put together or arranged; the combination of parts or elements that make up something.","examples":[{"sentence":"The composition of the team was carefully considered.","translation":"チームの構成は慎重に検討された。"},{"sentence":"The chemical composition of the soil was analyzed.","translation":"土壌の化学組成が分析された。"},{"sentence":"The painting's composition is very striking.","translation":"その絵画の構図は非常に印象的だ。"}],"collocations":["chemical composition (化学組成)","team composition (チーム構成)","musical composition (楽曲)","artistic composition (芸術的構成)","soil composition (土壌組成)","population composition (人口構成)"],"synonyms":["structure","arrangement","organization","makeup","constitution","formation"],"antonyms":["decomposition","disintegration"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"作文、論文、作曲","english_definition":"a piece of writing, especially one done as a school exercise; a piece of music.","examples":[{"sentence":"She wrote a brilliant composition for her English class.","translation":"彼女は英語の授業のために素晴らしい作文を書いた。"},{"sentence":"He is studying musical composition at the conservatory.","translation":"彼は音楽院で作曲を学んでいる。"},{"sentence":"The student's composition showed great creativity.","translation":"その学生の作文は素晴らしい創造性を示していた。"}],"collocations":["musical composition (楽曲)","school composition (学校の作文)","piano composition (ピアノ曲)","writing composition (作文)","original composition (オリジナル曲)"],"synonyms":["essay","paper","writing","piece","opus","creation"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"混合物、合成物","english_definition":"a substance or preparation made by combining different ingredients.","examples":[{"sentence":"The new paint has a special composition that makes it more durable.","translation":"その新しい塗料は耐久性を高める特殊な組成を持っている。"},{"sentence":"The medicine's composition includes several natural ingredients.","translation":"その薬の組成にはいくつかの天然成分が含まれている。"}],"collocations":["paint composition (塗料組成)","medicine composition (薬の組成)","material composition (材料組成)","ingredient composition (成分組成)"],"synonyms":["mixture","blend","compound","preparation","concoction"],"antonyms":["element","component"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「componere」（共に置く、組み立てる）に由来する。com-（共に）+ ponere（置く）から成り、元々は「何かを組み立てる行為」を意味していた。それが転じて「構成」「作文」「混合物」といった意味を持つようになった。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌkɒmpəˈzɪʃən/","syllables":"com-po-si-tion"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"compositions"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**composition**」は、文脈によって意味が大きく変わる単語です。何かを構成する要素の組み合わせを指す場合（例：チームの構成、化学組成）、文章や音楽の作品を指す場合（例：作文、楽曲）、複数の材料を混ぜ合わせたものを指す場合（例：塗料の組成）があります。どの意味で使われているかを文脈から判断することが重要です。特に、芸術や音楽の分野では「構図」や「作曲」といった専門的な意味合いを持つことがあります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The composition of the book was very bad.","correct":"✓ The writing in the book was very bad. / ✓ The composition of the book was poorly organized.","note":"本の「内容」や「文章」が悪い場合は、"writing" や "content" を使う方が適切です。"composition" は、本の構成や章立てが悪い場合に用います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is good at make compositions.","correct":"✓ He is good at writing compositions.","note":"「作文を書くのが得意」という場合は、動詞 "write" を使います。"make" は不自然です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The composition of the class is very diverse.","correct":"✓ The makeup of the class is very diverse. / ✓ The class has a very diverse composition.","note":"「クラスの構成」を指す場合、"makeup" や "the class has a diverse composition" の方がより自然な言い方です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["compose (動詞: 構成する、作曲する、書く)","composer (名詞: 作曲家)","composite (形容詞: 合成の、複合的な；名詞: 合成物、複合材料)","composure (名詞: 平静、落ち着き)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**composition**」は、いくつかの意味を持つ単語です。一番一般的な意味は、何かを構成する要素の「組み合わせ」や「構成」を指します。例えば、チームのメンバー構成や、絵画の構図などです。また、学校で書く「作文」や、音楽の「楽曲」という意味もあります。さらに、複数の材料を混ぜて作った「混合物」という意味もあります。文脈によって意味が異なるので、注意して読み解く必要があります。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The artist carefully considered the **composition** of the painting.","translation":"その画家は絵画の構図を注意深く検討した。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"構成・構図"},{"sentence":"She is taking a course in musical **composition**.","translation":"彼女は作曲の講座を受講している。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"作曲"},{"sentence":"The **composition** of the soil affects the growth of plants.","translation":"土壌の組成は植物の生育に影響を与える。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"組成"},{"sentence":"He wrote a beautiful **composition** about his childhood.","translation":"彼は子供時代について美しい作文を書いた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"作文"},{"sentence":"The **composition** of the committee was designed to represent all stakeholders.","translation":"委員会の構成は、すべての利害関係者を代表するように設計された。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"構成"}]}
